## ResultConfigBase interface

Result object configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ResultConfigBase<TCallback extends CallbackFunction = CallbackFunction> extends EventConfig 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [EventConfig](./base.eventconfig.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [callback?](./base.resultconfigbase.callback.md) | TCallback | <i>(Optional)</i> This function is user-defined, and will be called when a specified result is called |
|  [throwOnEvent?](./base.resultconfigbase.throwonevent.md) | unknown &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> An object that is thrown if the <code>Result</code> occurs. If nothing is provided, nothing will be thrown. |
